message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for the product. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
